content.prompt: Which of the following best describes the action of endocrine disruptors in organisms?

choices.label: Endocrine disruptors scar the lung tissue of animals, inducing respiratory difficulties.
Endocrine disruptors block the central nervous system of animals, leading to behavioral abnormalities.
Endocrine disruptors mimic naturally occurring hormones in animals, leading to developmental disorders.
Endocrine disruptors reduce primary productivity in plants, inducing a trophic cascade.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe environmental concepts and processes.
